AcceptReservedNodeExchange.name: AcceptReservedNodeExchange
AcceptReservedNodeExchange.description:
Grants permission to exchange a DC1 reserved node for a DC2 reserved node with no
                                                changes to the configuration

AuthorizeClusterSecurityGroupIngress.name: AuthorizeClusterSecurityGroupIngress
AuthorizeClusterSecurityGroupIngress.description:
Grants permission to add an inbound (ingress) rule to an Amazon Redshift security
                                                group

AuthorizeSnapshotAccess.name: AuthorizeSnapshotAccess
AuthorizeSnapshotAccess.description: Grants permission to the specified AWS account to restore a snapshot

BatchDeleteClusterSnapshots.name: BatchDeleteClusterSnapshots
BatchDeleteClusterSnapshots.description: Grants permission to delete snapshots in a batch of size upto 100

BatchModifyClusterSnapshots.name: BatchModifyClusterSnapshots
BatchModifyClusterSnapshots.description: Grants permission to modify settings for a list of snapshots

CancelQuery.name: CancelQuery
CancelQuery.description: Grants permission to cancel a query through the Amazon Redshift console

CancelQuerySession.name: CancelQuerySession
CancelQuerySession.description: Grants permission to see queries in the Amazon Redshift console

CancelResize.name: CancelResize
CancelResize.description: Grants permission to cancel a resize operation

CopyClusterSnapshot.name: CopyClusterSnapshot
CopyClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to copy a cluster snapshot

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: Grants permission to create a cluster

CreateClusterParameterGroup.name: CreateClusterParameterGroup
CreateClusterParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift parameter group

CreateClusterSecurityGroup.name: CreateClusterSecurityGroup
CreateClusterSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift security group

CreateClusterSnapshot.name: CreateClusterSnapshot
CreateClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a manual snapshot of the specified cluster

CreateClusterSubnetGroup.name: CreateClusterSubnetGroup
CreateClusterSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift subnet group

CreateClusterUser.name: CreateClusterUser
CreateClusterUser.description:
Grants permission to automatically create the specified Amazon Redshift user if it
                                                does not exist

CreateEventSubscription.name: CreateEventSubscription
CreateEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift event notification subscription

CreateHsmClientCertificate.name: CreateHsmClientCertificate
CreateHsmClientCertificate.description:
Grants permission to create an HSM client certificate that a cluster uses to connect
                                                to an HSM

CreateHsmConfiguration.name: CreateHsmConfiguration
CreateHsmConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to create an HSM configuration that contains information required
                                                by a cluster to store and use database encryption keys in a hardware security module
                                                (HSM)

CreateSavedQuery.name: CreateSavedQuery
CreateSavedQuery.description: Grants permission to create saved SQL queries through the Amazon Redshift console

CreateScheduledAction.name: CreateScheduledAction
CreateScheduledAction.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift scheduled action

CreateSnapshotCopyGrant.name: CreateSnapshotCopyGrant
CreateSnapshotCopyGrant.description:
Grants permission to create a snapshot copy grant and encrypt copied snapshots in
                                                a destination AWS Region

CreateSnapshotSchedule.name: CreateSnapshotSchedule
CreateSnapshotSchedule.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot schedule

CreateTags.name: CreateTags
CreateTags.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a specified resource

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned cluster

DeleteClusterParameterGroup.name: DeleteClusterParameterGroup
DeleteClusterParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift parameter group

DeleteClusterSecurityGroup.name: DeleteClusterSecurityGroup
DeleteClusterSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift security group

DeleteClusterSnapshot.name: DeleteClusterSnapshot
DeleteClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete a manual snapshot

DeleteClusterSubnetGroup.name: DeleteClusterSubnetGroup
DeleteClusterSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a cluster subnet group

DeleteEventSubscription.name: DeleteEventSubscription
DeleteEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift event notification subscription

DeleteHsmClientCertificate.name: DeleteHsmClientCertificate
DeleteHsmClientCertificate.description: Grants permission to delete an HSM client certificate

DeleteHsmConfiguration.name: DeleteHsmConfiguration
DeleteHsmConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift HSM configuration

DeleteSavedQueries.name: DeleteSavedQueries
DeleteSavedQueries.description: Grants permission to delete saved SQL queries through the Amazon Redshift console

DeleteScheduledAction.name: DeleteScheduledAction
DeleteScheduledAction.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift scheduled action

DeleteSnapshotCopyGrant.name: DeleteSnapshotCopyGrant
DeleteSnapshotCopyGrant.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot copy grant

DeleteSnapshotSchedule.name: DeleteSnapshotSchedule
DeleteSnapshotSchedule.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot schedule

DeleteTags.name: DeleteTags
DeleteTags.description: Grants permission to delete a tag or tags from a resource

DescribeAccountAttributes.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
DescribeAccountAttributes.description: Grants permission to describe attributes attached to the specified AWS account

DescribeClusterDbRevisions.name: DescribeClusterDbRevisions
DescribeClusterDbRevisions.description: Grants permission to describe database revisions for a cluster

DescribeClusterParameterGroups.name: DescribeClusterParameterGroups
DescribeClusterParameterGroups.description:
Grants permission to describe Amazon Redshift parameter groups, including parameter
                                                groups you created and the default parameter group

DescribeClusterParameters.name: DescribeClusterParameters
DescribeClusterParameters.description:
Grants permission to describe parameters contained within an Amazon Redshift parameter
                                                group

DescribeClusterSecurityGroups.name: DescribeClusterSecurityGroups
DescribeClusterSecurityGroups.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon Redshift security groups

DescribeClusterSnapshots.name: DescribeClusterSnapshots
DescribeClusterSnapshots.description:
Grants permission to describe one or more snapshot objects, which contain metadata
                                                about your cluster snapshots

DescribeClusterSubnetGroups.name: DescribeClusterSubnetGroups
DescribeClusterSubnetGroups.description:
Grants permission to describe one or more cluster subnet group objects, which contain
                                                metadata about your cluster subnet groups

DescribeClusterTracks.name: DescribeClusterTracks
DescribeClusterTracks.description: Grants permission to describe available maintenance tracks

DescribeClusterVersions.name: DescribeClusterVersions
DescribeClusterVersions.description: Grants permission to describe available Amazon Redshift cluster versions

DescribeClusters.name: DescribeClusters
DescribeClusters.description: Grants permission to describe properties of provisioned clusters

DescribeDefaultClusterParameters.name: DescribeDefaultClusterParameters
DescribeDefaultClusterParameters.description: Grants permission to describe parameter settings for a parameter group family

DescribeEventCategories.name: DescribeEventCategories
DescribeEventCategories.description:
Grants permission to describe event categories for all event source types, or for
                                                a specified source type

DescribeEventSubscriptions.name: DescribeEventSubscriptions
DescribeEventSubscriptions.description:
Grants permission to describe Amazon Redshift event notification subscriptions for
                                                the specified AWS account

DescribeEvents.name: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.description:
Grants permission to describe events related to clusters, security groups, snapshots,
                                                and parameter groups for the past 14 days

DescribeHsmClientCertificates.name: DescribeHsmClientCertificates
DescribeHsmClientCertificates.description: Grants permission to describe HSM client certificates

DescribeHsmConfigurations.name: DescribeHsmConfigurations
DescribeHsmConfigurations.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon Redshift HSM configurations

DescribeLoggingStatus.name: DescribeLoggingStatus
DescribeLoggingStatus.description:
Grants permission to describe whether information, such as queries and connection
                                                attempts, is being logged for a cluster

DescribeNodeConfigurationOptions.name: DescribeNodeConfigurationOptions
DescribeNodeConfigurationOptions.description:
Grants permission to describe properties of possible node configurations such as node
                                                type, number of nodes, and disk usage for the specified action type

DescribeOrderableClusterOptions.name: DescribeOrderableClusterOptions
DescribeOrderableClusterOptions.description: Grants permission to describe orderable cluster options

DescribeQuery.name: DescribeQuery
DescribeQuery.description: Grants permission to describe a query through the Amazon Redshift console

DescribeReservedNodeOfferings.name: DescribeReservedNodeOfferings
DescribeReservedNodeOfferings.description: Grants permission to describe available reserved node offerings by Amazon Redshift

DescribeReservedNodes.name: DescribeReservedNodes
DescribeReservedNodes.description: Grants permission to describe the reserved nodes

DescribeResize.name: DescribeResize
DescribeResize.description: Grants permission to describe the last resize operation for a cluster

DescribeSavedQueries.name: DescribeSavedQueries
DescribeSavedQueries.description: Grants permission to describe saved queries through the Amazon Redshift console

DescribeScheduledActions.name: DescribeScheduledActions
DescribeScheduledActions.description: Grants permission to describe created Amazon Redshift scheduled actions

DescribeSnapshotCopyGrants.name: DescribeSnapshotCopyGrants
DescribeSnapshotCopyGrants.description:
Grants permission to describe snapshot copy grants owned by the specified AWS account
                                                in the destination AWS Region

DescribeSnapshotSchedules.name: DescribeSnapshotSchedules
DescribeSnapshotSchedules.description: Grants permission to describe snapshot schedules

DescribeStorage.name: DescribeStorage
DescribeStorage.description: Grants permission to describe account level backups storage size and provisional storage

DescribeTable.name: DescribeTable
DescribeTable.description: Grants permission to describe a table through the Amazon Redshift console

DescribeTableRestoreStatus.name: DescribeTableRestoreStatus
DescribeTableRestoreStatus.description:
Grants permission to describe status of one or more table restore requests made using
                                                the RestoreTableFromClusterSnapshot API action

DisableLogging.name: DisableLogging
DisableLogging.description:
Grants permission to disable logging information, such as queries and connection attempts,
                                                for a cluster

DisableSnapshotCopy.name: DisableSnapshotCopy
DisableSnapshotCopy.description: Grants permission to disable the automatic copy of snapshots for a cluster

EnableLogging.name: EnableLogging
EnableLogging.description:
Grants permission to enable logging information, such as queries and connection attempts,
                                                for a cluster

EnableSnapshotCopy.name: EnableSnapshotCopy
EnableSnapshotCopy.description: Grants permission to enable the automatic copy of snapshots for a cluster

ExecuteQuery.name: ExecuteQuery
ExecuteQuery.description: Grants permission to execute a query through the Amazon Redshift console

FetchResults.name: FetchResults
FetchResults.description: Grants permission to fetch query results through the Amazon Redshift console

GetClusterCredentials.name: GetClusterCredentials
GetClusterCredentials.description:
Grants permission to get temporary credentials to access an Amazon Redshift database
                                                by the specified AWS account

GetReservedNodeExchangeOfferings.name: GetReservedNodeExchangeOfferings
GetReservedNodeExchangeOfferings.description:
Grants permission to get an array of DC2 ReservedNodeOfferings that matches the payment
                                                type, term, and usage price of the given DC1 reserved node

JoinGroup.name: JoinGroup
JoinGroup.description: Grants permission to join the specified Amazon Redshift group

ListDatabases.name: ListDatabases
ListDatabases.description: Grants permission to list databases through the Amazon Redshift console

ListSavedQueries.name: ListSavedQueries
ListSavedQueries.description: Grants permission to list saved queries through the Amazon Redshift console

ListSchemas.name: ListSchemas
ListSchemas.description: Grants permission to list schemas through the Amazon Redshift console

ListTables.name: ListTables
ListTables.description: Grants permission to list tables through the Amazon Redshift console

ModifyCluster.name: ModifyCluster
ModifyCluster.description: Grants permission to modify the settings of a cluster

ModifyClusterDbRevision.name: ModifyClusterDbRevision
ModifyClusterDbRevision.description: Grants permission to modify the database revision of a cluster

ModifyClusterIamRoles.name: ModifyClusterIamRoles
ModifyClusterIamRoles.description:
Grants permission to modify the list of AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles
                                                that can be used by a cluster to access other AWS services

ModifyClusterMaintenance.name: ModifyClusterMaintenance
ModifyClusterMaintenance.description: Grants permission to modify the maintenance settings of a cluster

ModifyClusterParameterGroup.name: ModifyClusterParameterGroup
ModifyClusterParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a parameter group

ModifyClusterSnapshot.name: ModifyClusterSnapshot
ModifyClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to modify the settings of a snapshot

ModifyClusterSnapshotSchedule.name: ModifyClusterSnapshotSchedule
ModifyClusterSnapshotSchedule.description: Grants permission to modify a snapshot schedule for a cluster

ModifyClusterSubnetGroup.name: ModifyClusterSubnetGroup
ModifyClusterSubnetGroup.description:
Grants permission to modify a cluster subnet group to include the specified list of
                                                VPC subnets

ModifyEventSubscription.name: ModifyEventSubscription
ModifyEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to modify an existing Amazon Redshift event notification subscription

ModifySavedQuery.name: ModifySavedQuery
ModifySavedQuery.description: Grants permission to modify an existing saved query through the Amazon Redshift console

ModifyScheduledAction.name: ModifyScheduledAction
ModifyScheduledAction.description: Grants permission to modify an existing Amazon Redshift scheduled action

ModifySnapshotCopyRetentionPeriod.name: ModifySnapshotCopyRetentionPeriod
ModifySnapshotCopyRetentionPeriod.description:
Grants permission to modify the number of days to retain snapshots in the destination
                                                AWS Region after they are copied from the source AWS Region

ModifySnapshotSchedule.name: ModifySnapshotSchedule
ModifySnapshotSchedule.description: Grants permission to modify a snapshot schedule

PauseCluster.name: PauseCluster
PauseCluster.description: Grants permission to pause a cluster

PurchaseReservedNodeOffering.name: PurchaseReservedNodeOffering
PurchaseReservedNodeOffering.description: Grants permission to purchase a reserved node

RebootCluster.name: RebootCluster
RebootCluster.description: Grants permission to reboot a cluster

ResetClusterParameterGroup.name: ResetClusterParameterGroup
ResetClusterParameterGroup.description:
Grants permission to set one or more parameters of a parameter group to their default
                                                values and set the source values of the parameters to "engine-default"

ResizeCluster.name: ResizeCluster
ResizeCluster.description: Grants permission to change the size of a cluster

RestoreFromClusterSnapshot.name: RestoreFromClusterSnapshot
RestoreFromClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a cluster from a snapshot

RestoreTableFromClusterSnapshot.name: RestoreTableFromClusterSnapshot
RestoreTableFromClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a table from a table in an Amazon Redshift cluster snapshot

ResumeCluster.name: ResumeCluster
ResumeCluster.description: Grants permission to resume a cluster

RevokeClusterSecurityGroupIngress.name: RevokeClusterSecurityGroupIngress
RevokeClusterSecurityGroupIngress.description:
Grants permission to revoke an ingress rule in an Amazon Redshift security group for
                                                a previously authorized IP range or Amazon EC2 security group

RevokeSnapshotAccess.name: RevokeSnapshotAccess
RevokeSnapshotAccess.description: Grants permission to revoke access from the specified AWS account to restore a snapshot

RotateEncryptionKey.name: RotateEncryptionKey
RotateEncryptionKey.description: Grants permission to rotate an encryption key for a cluster

ViewQueriesFromConsole.name: ViewQueriesFromConsole
ViewQueriesFromConsole.description: Grants permission to view query results through the Amazon Redshift console

ViewQueriesInConsole.name: ViewQueriesInConsole
ViewQueriesInConsole.description:
Grants permission to terminate running queries and loads through the Amazon Redshift
                                                console
